p: Body masses of females and males of A. butcheri at 250 mm in the Moore River and Swan River estuaries and Walpole‐Nornalup Inlet were inversely related to the corresponding expected ages at 250 mm in those systems (Figure 7; p < 0.001, r = −0.947 for females and p < 0.01, r = −0.787 for males). While the natural logarithms of M 250 mm and associated A 250 mm for both females and males in the Wellstead Estuary in 2013–15 lay close to the regression line for the corresponding sex derived using data for the above three estuaries, this did not apply to the corresponding values of those variables for that estuary in 1993–96, and thus constituted conspicuous outliers (Figure 7).
